meanings.definition: A type of winter sport involving skiing and horseback riding.
meanings.sent1: During the skiorings event, participants showcase their skiing and horseback riding skills.
meanings.sent2: I watched a thrilling skiorings competition last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The skiorings competition had everyone laughing as the horses tried to ski!
meanings.sent4: Her performance in the skiorings was as graceful as a ballet dancer on ice.
meanings.sent5: The skiorings experience was unforgettable, with the snow-covered slopes and galloping horses.

meanings.definition: The act of participating in skiorings.
meanings.sent1: Many people enjoy the adrenaline rush of skiorings.
meanings.sent2: His dream was to compete in professional skiorings.
meanings.sent3: The skiorings event turned into a hilarious race between friends.
meanings.sent4: Participating in skiorings felt like flying through a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The skiorings competition brought together athletes from all over the world.

meanings.sent1: She carefully packed all the skiorings gear for the trip.
meanings.sent2: The skiorings equipment included skis, helmets, and horse gear.
meanings.sent3: His collection of skiorings gear filled the entire garage.
meanings.sent4: The shiny skiorings equipment gleamed under the winter sun.
meanings.sent5: The skiorings gear was essential for a safe and enjoyable experience on the slopes.
